name: shelly-fridge-controller
description: Production-grade thermostat controller for Shelly Plus 1/1PM with comprehensive test coverage

scripts.build: npm run build:core && npm run build:features
scripts.build:core: mkdir -p dist && esbuild src/boot/main-core.ts --bundle --minify --outfile=dist/core.tmp.js --format=iife --platform=neutral --target=es2015 --supported:arrow=false --supported:destructuring=false --supported:template-literal=false --supported:for-of=false --supported:object-rest-spread=false --supported:class=false --charset=utf8 --drop:debugger --legal-comments=none --tree-shaking=true && node unwrap-bundle.js dist/core.tmp.js dist/main-core.js && rm dist/core.tmp.js && echo "Core build: $(wc -c < dist/main-core.js | tr -d ' ') bytes"
scripts.build:features: mkdir -p dist && esbuild src/boot/main-features.ts --bundle --minify --outfile=dist/features.tmp.js --format=iife --platform=neutral --target=es2015 --supported:arrow=false --supported:destructuring=false --supported:template-literal=false --supported:for-of=false --supported:object-rest-spread=false --supported:class=false --charset=utf8 --drop:debugger --legal-comments=none --tree-shaking=true && node unwrap-bundle.js dist/features.tmp.js dist/main-features.js && rm dist/features.tmp.js && echo "Features build: $(wc -c < dist/main-features.js | tr -d ' ') bytes"
